title: Best of The Herd for Jun 30, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 30, 2020
description:
The media is overreacting to the Cam Newton signing

Kevin Durant made an awful decision to join the Nets

LeBron knows the Lakers need massive roster upgrades

Colin ranks his top ten AFC QBs


Guests: Peter Scharger, FOX NFL Reporter

Lincoln Riley, Oklahoma Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
